description:
Yuuma Uchida narrated the episode and reintroduced the characters. 
The episode also contained:
- interview with Rikiya Koyama (Klaus) and Daisuke Sakaguchi (Leonardo) voice actors
- interview with Taisei Iwasaki music composer
- interview with Unison Square Garden, the band singing the ED
- the full OP song in an official AMV format
